title: [ZLS1-4] User Can Bypass Locking Period Without Penalty Using emergencyWithdraw
summary: A bug has been reported in the ZealousSwapFarms smart contract that allows users to bypass the locking period for withdrawing tokens by using the `emergencyWithdraw` function. This function does not have the same restriction as the `withdraw` function, which enforces the locking period. This means that users can immediately withdraw their tokens without waiting for the locking period to end. To fix this, a penalty mechanism should be introduced, such as deducting a percentage of the withdrawn amount. This issue has been addressed and is now fixed.
